entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as speaking to Harry in the Great Hall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned throughout the passage.

entities.name: binns
entities.description: Binns is a teacher who Harry is late for.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is mentioned as getting up from the Ra venclaw table and joining Cedric.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as being with Fleur Delacour and later inviting Harry to join them.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as slouching off to join Cedric and Fleur.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as possibly being at the school, but it is later revealed that they are not.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned as joining Cedric and Fleur.

relationships.description: Harry is late for Binns, as mentioned in the passage.
Fleur Delacour and Cedric are together at the Ra venclaw table.
Krum joins Cedric and Fleur in the side chamber.
Harry mentions that he has no family who would turn up to see him.
Cedric and Viktor Krum are together in the side chamber.
Cedric invites Harry to join them in the side chamber.
